title: New: How To Dress Well – Just Once EP
body: [![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/justonce.jpg "justonce")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8545-new-how-to-dress-well-just-once-ep/attachment/justonce) **How To Dress Well** has a new entirely orchestral focused EP entitled, ‘_Just Once_’. The record features entirely new takes on _Love remains_’ “_Suicide Dream 1_“, “_Suicide Dream 2_“, and “_Decisions_“, as well as a new song, “_Suicide Dream 3_“. As expected the EP is an enchanting and moving re-imagining of the songs. One dollar from the sale of each 10” will be donated to the mental health organization [MindFreedom.org](http://mindfreedom.org/), and will be released on June 21. Stream the EP below. Just Once EP by yours truly
